sqlMap.select: SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS REQ_CNT FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NULL AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '01' ) AS REQ_CNT FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# AND A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = #regUsrId#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId#
SELECT A.PRJ_TYPE FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#

SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID ,A.USR_ID ,A.FVR_ID ,B.MENU_NM AS FVR_NM ,A.FVR_DATA1 AS FVR_SUB_DATA1 ,B.MENU_URL AS FVR_SUB_DATA2 ,B.MENU_TYPE_CD AS FVR_SUB_DATA3 ,SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.FVR_DATA1, '3') AS FVR_SUB_DATA4 ,SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.FVR_DATA1, '2') AS FVR_SUB_DATA5 ,'' AS FVR_SUB_DATA6 ,A.FVR_TYPE ,A.FVR_USE_CD FROM STM2002 A INNER JOIN STM2000 B ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.FVR_DATA1 = B.MENU_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.FVR_TYPE = '01' AND A.FVR_USE_CD = '01' UNION SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID ,A.USR_ID ,A.FVR_ID ,B.PRJ_NM AS FVR_NM ,A.FVR_DATA1 AS FVR_SUB_DATA1 ,B.PRJ_DESC AS FVR_SUB_DATA2 ,'' AS FVR_SUB_DATA3 ,'' AS FVR_SUB_DATA4 ,'' AS FVR_SUB_DATA5 ,'' AS FVR_SUB_DATA6 ,A.FVR_TYPE ,A.FVR_USE_CD FROM STM2002 A INNER JOIN PRJ1000 B ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.FVR_DATA1 = B.PRJ_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND B.PRJ_GRP_CD = '01') WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.FVR_TYPE = '02' AND A.FVR_USE_CD = '01' UNION SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID ,A.USR_ID ,A.FVR_ID ,B.PRJ_NM AS FVR_NM ,A.FVR_DATA1 AS FVR_SUB_DATA1 ,A.FVR_DATA2 AS FVR_SUB_DATA2 ,C.PRJ_NM AS FVR_SUB_DATA3 ,B.PRJ_DESC AS FVR_SUB_DATA4 ,'' AS FVR_SUB_DATA5 ,'' AS FVR_SUB_DATA6 ,A.FVR_TYPE ,A.FVR_USE_CD FROM STM2002 A INNER JOIN PRJ1000 B ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.FVR_DATA1 = B.PRJ_GRP_ID AND FVR_DATA2 = B.PRJ_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND B.PRJ_GRP_CD = '02') INNER JOIN PRJ1000 C ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND B.PRJ_GRP_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND C.USE_CD = '01' AND C.PRJ_GRP_CD = '01') WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.FVR_TYPE IN '03' AND A.FVR_USE_CD = '01' UNION SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID ,A.USR_ID ,A.FVR_ID ,B.AUTH_GRP_NM AS FVR_NM ,A.FVR_DATA1 AS FVR_SUB_DATA1 ,A.FVR_DATA2 AS FVR_SUB_DATA2 ,A.FVR_DATA3 AS FVR_SUB_DATA3 ,D.PRJ_NM AS FVR_SUB_DATA4 ,C.PRJ_NM AS FVR_SUB_DATA5 ,B.AUTH_GRP_DESC AS FVR_SUB_DAT6 ,A.FVR_TYPE ,A.FVR_USE_CD FROM STM2002 A INNER JOIN PRJ2000 B ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.FVR_DATA2 = B.PRJ_ID AND A.FVR_DATA3 = B.AUTH_GRP_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' ) INNER JOIN PRJ1000 C ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.FVR_DATA2 = C.PRJ_ID AND C.USE_CD = '01' ) INNER JOIN PRJ1000 D ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = D.LIC_GRP_ID AND C.PRJ_GRP_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND D.USE_CD = '01' AND D.PRJ_GRP_CD = '01') WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.FVR_TYPE = '04' AND A.FVR_USE_CD = '01'

SELECT count(*) FROM STM2002 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.FVR_ID = #fvrId# AND A.FVR_TYPE = #fvrType#
AND A.FVR_DATA1 = #fvrData1#
AND A.FVR_DATA1 = #fvrData1#
AND A.FVR_DATA1 = #fvrData1# AND A.FVR_DATA2 = #fvrData2#
AND A.FVR_DATA1 = #fvrData1# AND A.FVR_DATA2 = #fvrData2# AND A.FVR_DATA3 = #fvrData3#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_FVR_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_FVR_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'FVR' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_FVR_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(FVR_ID) AS NEW_FVR_ID FROM STM2002 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.FVR_ID LIKE 'FVR' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO STM2002 ( LIC_GRP_ID, USR_ID, FVR_ID ,FVR_TYPE, FVR_DATA1, FVR_DATA2 ,FVR_DATA3, FVR_USE_CD ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #usrId#, #newFvrId# ,#fvrType#, #fvrData1#, #fvrData2# ,#fvrData3#, #fvrUseCd# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM2002 SET FVR_USE_CD = #fvrUseCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND USR_ID = #usrId# AND FVR_ID = #fvrId#
